GraphEditingTools.AddEdgeToolTip: adds an edge between two vertices [Ctrl + Shift + 5]
GraphEditingTools.AddVertexMultipleTimeFramesToolTip: adds a vertex in multiple timeFrames [Ctrl + Shift + 3]
GraphEditingTools.SelectToolTip: selects an edge or a vertex
GraphEditingTools.ShortestPathToolTip: finds the shortest path between two vertices [Ctrl + Shift + 7]
GraphEditingTools.SelectMultiToolTip: select, scroll and drag mode [Ctrl + Shift + 1]

SnapshotTools.CurrentGraphCompleteToolTip: Complete Snapshot of the current graph
SnapshotTools.CurrentGraphViewOnlyToolTip: Snapshot of the visible part of graph

BackgroundColorChange.Title: Change Background Color
BackgroundColorChange.Information: Select a color for the background
BackgroundColorChange.Error: There is no project/graph to change color

AddEdgeAttribute.Information: Adds the Edge based on an Attribute Value

AddEdgeAttributeSimilairty.Information: Adds the Edge based on an Attribute Value

Lang.AboutMeerkat:
Meerkat is a social network analysis tool developed at AMII, Department of Computing Science, University of Alberta, under the leadership of Dr. Osmar Za√Øane.
For more details please visit us online at: https://www.amii.ca/meerkat or email us at meerkat@cs.ualberta.ca
Version Release Date: 2017 September 31
Current Developers : Sankalp Prabhakar, Talat Iqbal Syed
Past and Present Team Members (alphabetically): Abhimanyu Panwar, Ali Yadollahi, Afra Abnar, Amin Travelsi, Eric Verbeek, Farzad Sangi, Justin Fagnan, Jiyang Chen, Matt Gallivan, Mansoureh Takaffoli, Reihaneh Rabbany, Sankalp Prabhakar, Shiva Zamani Gharaghooshi, Talat Iqbal Syed, Xiaoxiao Li.
Lang.DocumentationMeerkat: Coming soon - check webpage - https://www.amii.ca/meerkat for latest version of documentation.

StatusMessages.OperationFailed: Failed to complete the requested operation

StatusMessages.SnapshotAllProjects: Snapshots of all the graphs in all the projects have been saved
StatusMessages.SnapshotAllGraphs: Snapshots of all the graphs in the current projects have been saved
StatusMessages.SnapshotCurrentGraph: Snapshot of the complete graph is saved
StatusMessages.SanpshotCurrentView: Snapshot of the current view of the graph has been saved

StatusMessages.AppliedClosedSettings: Applied the Settings and Closed the Window
StatusMessages.VertexTooltipEnabled: Tooltip for the vertices are enabled
StatusMessages.VertexTooltipDisabled: Tooltip for the vertices are disabled
StatusMessages.VertexPinningEnabled: Pinning for the vertices are enabled
StatusMessages.VertexPinningDisabled: Pinning for the vertices are disabled
